mainContent.heading: What is the Collection Grid Section?
paragraphs: The Collection Grid Section is a Shopify section designed to showcase your product collections in a structured, visually balanced grid layout.
It helps store visitors quickly browse and understand your offerings by highlighting collection images, titles, and calls to action.
With flexible layout options, this section adapts seamlessly across devices while maintaining a clean and professional storefront appearance.

features.title: Collection Images
features.description: Assign unique images to each collection for clear visual representation.

features.title: Content Display Control
features.description: Enable or disable titles, descriptions, and buttons as needed.

features.title: Button Configuration
features.description: Add a customizable call-to-action button such as “Shop Now.”

features.title: Color & Styling
features.description: Adjust colors for text, backgrounds, and buttons to match your brand.
